DataElement.preferredName: Metastatic Tumor Other Radiation Therapy Type
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text field to describe the other type of radiation administered for the metastatic tumor.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Radiation Therapy Metastatic Neoplasm Other Administered
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Information related to treatment of another therapeutic radiation not previously specified given to an individual for disease that has spread from its original site of growth to another site.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: use PHOTOTHERAPY, LASER THERAPY, or ULTRAVIOLET THERAPY for therapeutic radiation with visible, laser, or ultraviolet light, respectively.

Concepts.definition: Treatment of a disease by means of exposure of the target or the whole body to radiation. Radiation therapy is often used as part of curative therapy and occasionally as a component of palliative treatment for cancer. Other uses include total body irradiation prior to transplantation.

Property.preferredDefinition: A tumor that has spread from its original (primary) site of growth to another site, close to or distant from the primary site.  Metastasis is characteristic of advanced malignancies, but in rare instances can be seen in neoplasms lacking malignant morphology.:Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.:The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

Concepts.definition: A tumor that has spread from its original (primary) site of growth to another site, close to or distant from the primary site.  Metastasis is characteristic of advanced malignancies, but in rare instances can be seen in neoplasms lacking malignant morphology.
Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.
The act of having given something (e.g., a medication or test).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: Created for TCGA collection of Exceptional Responder data per request by T.Lichtenberg. mc 6/23/15

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: a text field to describe of a method of radiation treatment administered to a patient.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: actions or administration of therapeutic agents to produce an effect that is intended to alter the course of a pathologic process (NCI).

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: Text; the words of something written.
